channel.title: [PI] PK point shop change
channel.description:
if (c.myShopId == 73) { if (c.pkPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){ c.pkPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID); c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1); c.getItems().resetItems(3823); } } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough PvP Points points to buy this item."); } } if (c.myShopId == 74) { if (c.pkPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){ c.pkPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID); c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1); c.getItems().resetItems(3823); } } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough PvP Points points to buy this item."); } }
Those are my Pk point shops, i want to change them where you buy the stuff in side the shop with tokens (id is 12852) in stead of using points. insidiaX is the source. also i already tried changing the tokkul shop, but the tokkul hop doesn't work to begin with..

item.title: [PI] PK point shop change
item.dc:creator: @hotkid8200 hotkid8200
item.description:
@hotkid8200 wrote:

if (c.myShopId == 73) { if (c.pkPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){ c.pkPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID); c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1); c.getItems().resetItems(3823); } } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough PvP Points points to buy this item."); } 
		}
		if (c.myShopId == 74) {
			if (c.pkPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
				if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){
					c.pkPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
					c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
					c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
				}
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You do not have enough PvP Points points to buy this item.");			
			}

		}</blockquote>

Those are my Pk point shops, i want to change them where you buy the stuff in side the shop with tokens (id is 12852) in stead of using points.

insidiaX is the source.

also i already tried changing the tokkul shop, but the tokkul hop doesn’t work to begin with…
